Soungalo Coulibaly (1955 - 2004) a Malian drummer.

Coulibaly was brought up in the purest Bambara tradition. Those same qualities led to recognition in Europe, where he regularly presented concerts with his group, as well as giving courses. His three previous CDs are regarded as references by his peers.

Soungalo died in 2004.
